name: Chris Craven
tagline: Mobile and web developer specializing in PHP and JavaScript
body:
### Skills
Web application development with **PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, AJAX, 
jQuery, and JavaScript.**
>—	Created an app store with social features utilizing **Phalcon** framework.

Graphic design and animation with **Adobe CS** (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Fireworks, Flash, Edge Animate).
>—	Produced engaging ad banners and interfaces featuring motion graphics.

Mobile application development with **jQuery Mobile, YQL, JSON, XML, 
and PhoneGap Build.**
>—	Programmed apps to present crowdfunding data from REST APIs.

 
### Portfolio

<http://github.com/christophercraven>
##### Phalcon PHP Web Application
